comment: She is really great and teaches very well. She makes the class enjoyable while teaching you a lot. You will do well if you simply attend class.

This class was amazing. I learned so much about myslef as a writer. Nicholson is great. Very nice and understanding. Final is a portfolio slam!!! Super easy! Do the work and there is NO WAY you will fail. A is very possible!

Stuff that she asks students to do feels so high school, like keep a journal which is a real bother to write, and extremly time consuming.  However, as far as writing papers comes, she sort of grades your first draft and then gives you feedback what to do.  All in all, her class is not fantastic but manageble, and with some effort you can get an A.

However, as far as writing papers comes, she sort of grades your first draft and then gives you feedback what to do.  All in all, her class is not fantastic, but manageble, and with some effort you can get an A

I LOVE this teacher! She is the best...her essays consist of writing what you feel like! It's the best english class ever...the only "work" outside of class is finishing the essays(which u get time in class to do),a personal journal, and keep up with a writer's notebook...o yea and the final is a portfolio slam(reading your best work)!
She's a very good teacher and she's very helpful! I would recommend you take her class

This is a real teacher. She is dedicated, warm, and has a great sense of humor. She loves to have sessions with students to progress their writing process. Highly recommend her, but don't think she will be teaching 1102 next semester (Spring 08).
